item.title: Fatina API
Getting Started
item.description: Installation Download the library and include it in your code: <script src="js/Fatina.min.js"></script> You can also reference a CDN-hosted version in your code, thanks to cdnjs. For example: <script src="..."></script> More advanced users might want to… Use npm npm install Fatina Then include the Fatina module with the standard node.js require: var Fatina = require('Fatina'); And you can use Fatina as in all other samples :
